page.title: 09HIGHER KEHELLAND FARM 3
page.content: These plants were arranged in rows according to their varieties and their harvesting time.Included among the crops in this field were Brussel Sprouts,Winter Cauliflower,Potatoes and French Beans. Several of these crops were being tested for large commercial companies.Included among the winter cauliflower was a variety which Mr.Bennet and some of his colleagues had developed themselves which was ideally suited for local conditions.Despite running a modern farm and using modern methods for efficient production,Mr.Bennet is careful not to disturb the balance of nature more than he must to make his farm profitable and to support his family.
